args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Slide-Out Room May Extend While Driving

Thor Motor Company (TMC) is recalling certain 2023-2026 Axis, Chateau, Four Winds, 2023-2025 Coleman, Echelon, Freedom Elite, Geneva, Outlaw, Quantum, Vegas, 2025 Eddie Bauer, Freedom Traveler, Pasadena, and 2024-2025 Magnitude motorhomes.  The slide-Out room can be deployed without the parking brake engaged, allowing the room to extend while the vehicle is in motion.A slide-Out room that extends unexpectedly increases the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 4251.0"
